title: Simulation-Based Quality Engineering Experimental Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical concepts and general comprehension of engineering problems
context.additional_context: Learners operate simulation tools in a non-real-time LMS environment using digital devices to engage in project-based learning, focusing on solving quality issues linked to daily life.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more experimental design techniques using simulation software.
Learners can identify core quality attributes of products/processes with 90% accuracy in a virtual laboratory environment.
Learners can complete a step-by-step project that solves real-world industrial problems (e.g., minimizing product defects) through simulation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
